mapper.select: SELECT i.inquiry_id AS inquiry_id , i.inquiry_type AS inquiry_type , i.inquiry_title AS inquiry_title , i.inquiry_writer_email AS inquiry_writer_email , i.inquiry_comments AS inquiry_comments , TO_CHAR(i.inquiry_regdate, 'YYYY-mm-DD') AS inquiry_regdate , i.inquiry_answer AS inquiry_answer , TO_CHAR(i.inquiry_answer_regdate, 'YYYY-mm-DD') AS inquiry_answer_regdate , i.file_key AS file_key , i.status AS status FROM inquiry i INNER JOIN members m ON i.inquiry_writer_email = m.member_email WHERE TO_CHAR(i.inquiry_regdate, 'yyyymmdd') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
